0: It was evident from the outset that exceptional customer service is of paramount importance at The Fairmont
I would strongly recommend this Hotel for a great experience but make sure you have your itinerary and check it before you travel
We left you to go to Sandy Lane and whilst their ‘ everything ’ is top drawer you guys snd girls are not far behind at all
Stylish with a touch of modern
The place is lovely and the staff very friendly which is why we came back but this year was a bit of a let down
The hotel staff are amazing so welcoming friendly helpful
The rooms beaches restaurants were fabulous the staff was more than amazing
The unexpected attention to detail which included toiletries customized with our names made us feel special
My wife I decided to get away for a long weekend and chose the Fairmont
1: We are clients of old having stayed at the Fairmont regularly over the last 25 years
As always we left with the firm intention to come back as soon as we can
The beach is excellent and my wife was privileged to see some baby turtles hatching out of their eggs buried in the sand and making their perilous journey into the water quite a sight
if you can try to check out the beautiful island
The room was nice but the rest of the experience was average
Afternoon Tea I m just glad it was complimentary
Great location but does nt make up for the tired hotel poor food and lack of service
Sandy Lane is a destination for Afternoon Tea drawing in locals and tourists from other hotels
This visit was our 3rd to the Fairmont however the title really says it all
overall would we go back yes Management are doing a excellent job 217
2: so glad I got the tour this time
No one answered the phone for aprox
The television channels sometimes worked and the picture quality was not the greatest
The hotel itself is very tired looking and looks like it is from the late 1980s
Main restaurant was closed during our stay
I do n’t have enough words to write about our stay
The service when we sat at the tables near the bar was poor
With one or two small fixes this would have been perfect
I have been a returning guest to the Fairmont for 6 years

The location and the beach is second to none and you would be hard pressed to find anywhere as good in this part of the world or any part of the world for that matter However the stars of the hotel has started to dim anc little indisciplines have crept into the place and it ’s frustrating to see the wonderful long standing staff who pride themselves on customer service suffering due to poor management and what appears slackness in the standards that were such a benchmark for this hotel
